WorkItem.Description:
Using the Python grammar with the input below issues an invalid operator exception (download 29 april 2008)
----------------------------------------------------
for quant in range(99, 0, -1):
   if quant > 1:
      print quant, "bottles of beer on the wall,", quant, "bottles of beer."

"""
99 Bottles
"""

WorkItem.Summary: System.InvalidOperationException (Stack empty) on illegal python input
